name: Frosted Spear
description: A common weapon among residents of Warren Snowfield. Infused with frost to reflect the local flavor. It's very popular, because it's cheap yet highly effective.

normals.name: Thrust
normals.description:
While on the ground, swing the long spear to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **20.1%** of ATK plus **121** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **18.5%** of ATK plus **111** and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **38.5%** of ATK plus **231** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **59.2%** of ATK plus **355** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **93.8%** of ATK plus **563** and knock the target back a significant distance.

normals.name: Jumping Strike
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **22.3%** of ATK plus **134**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **18.8%** of ATK plus **113**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **37.1%** of ATK plus **223**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **89%** of ATK plus **534**.

normals.name: Crashing Drive
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Crashing Drive.
While falling, deal damage equal to **6.4%** of ATK plus **38** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **39.3%** of ATK plus **236** and suspend the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** damage.

normals.name: Spear Flurry
normals.description:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Spear Flurry.
Upon hit, **strongly suspend** the target, dealing damage equal to **39.8%** of ATK plus **239**. Tap again to continue attacking the airborne target, dealing up to **79.5%** of ATK plus **477** damage to a single target.

normals.name: Sneak Attack
normals.description: Thrust the long spear forward, dealing damage equal to **256.5%** of ATK plus **1539**.

dodge.name: Flying Kick
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Flying Kick.
Once hit the target, deal damage equal to **58.2%** of ATK plus **349**, knock the enemies back significantly, and **stun** enemies for **1** second or **0.5** seconds to Wanderers.

dodge.name: Lunging Smash
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Lunging Smash.
Slam the long spear into the ground, dealing damage equal to **42.8%** of ATK plus **257** and **strongly suspending** targets.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

skill.name: Moonchaser
skill.description: **Strongly suspend** targets and go airborne, dealing damage equal to **103.1%** of ATK plus **619**. Cooldown: **25** seconds.

discharge.name: Spear Dance
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and grab the target and shake them multiple times, dealing damage equal to **205.4%** of ATK plus **1232**. The last hit **strongly suspends** the target.
